text: This Armed Forces Day we thank all who have served the United States in uniform with honor. I will always be grateful to service members and their families for the sacrifices they make-not just on this Armed Forces Day but every day.

A proud son of immigrants Esteban Torres dedicated his life to serving his communitynation in uniform & working families in Eastern LA County.Proud to intro bill w/ @RepLindaSanchez so future generations may remember his legacy/be inspired by his service
⛽️ Mad about high gas prices? So am I. Big Oil companies are #RippingOffAmericans. That’s why I voted in support of the Consumer Fuel Price Gouging Prevention Act. It’s time to hold them accountable.

Our public safety officers witness and experience severe trauma which can have a significant impact on their mental health. Tonight we passed the #PublicSafetyOfficerSupport Act to give police firefighters and EMTs the support they need and deserve.

57 years of Head Start means providing health services such as immunizations dental medical and Mental Health and nutritional services and early identification of health problems. #HappyBDayHeadStart!

The Water Resources Development Act is our legislative commitment to investing in and protecting our communities from flooding events restoring our environment and ecosystems and keeping our nation’s competitiveness by supporting our ports and harbors. #WRDAWorksForWater
